info.name: 2036 Daimyo
info.attribution:
Game layout and scripting by Mitchell Stolycia, released to the the public domain under CC0. The following assets are by Delapouite, Caro Asercion, and Lorc, all of which available from https://game-icons.net under CC BY 3.0:

Delapouite:

https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/dango.html

https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/samurai-helmet.html

https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/roman-toga.html

Caro Asercion:

https://game-icons.net/1x1/caro-asercion/boba.html

Lorc:

https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/trade.html

All other assets, including the library image were created by Mitchell Stolycia and are usable CC0.
info.description: Indulge yourself in boba tea and dango while visiting famous Buddhist temples. But watch out! Other daimyo forces want to get in on the action too.

info.helpText:
Colour-blind friendly.

In this implementation, it is not possible to play by placing the caste pieces yourself at set-up. However, it does allow for either a random starting hand of tiles, are a player-selected starting hand.

clickRoutine.note: Check that the user really wants to set up a fresh game

fields.text: Are you sure that you want to erase any progress and start a new game?

clickRoutine.note: move each seat into the DEFAULT collection

loopRoutine.note: stopping duplicate statues on the hexCs

fields.text: Would you like players to have random starting tiles, or would you like to choose your own?
